prompt:
SCENE: Functor transformation visualization.
- LEFT side: Three boxes in a vertical column, each containing a simple shape
  - Box 1: Star
  - Box 2: Circle  
  - Box 3: Triangle
- CENTER: Large transformation arrow pointing RIGHT, glowing purple
- RIGHT side: Same three boxes (same color, same size - structure preserved)
  - Box 1: Larger star (transformed)
  - Box 2: Larger circle (transformed)
  - Box 3: Larger triangle (transformed)
- The boxes themselves are IDENTICAL left and right
- Only the contents have changed

STYLE:
- Clean vector illustration
- Soft neon colors
- Dark background

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Transformation flows LEFT to RIGHT
- Boxes are visually identical (same structure)
- Only internal shapes change
- Arrow points clearly to the RIGHT

CONSTRAINTS:
- No text
- No characters
- Family-friendly
- Original artwork only
